name: resumint
description: Resume intelligence application with Next.js frontend and Express backend

scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"

author: Manthan Desai
